title.bibl: Denní Hlasatel, Apr. 6, 1918. Czech Section for Bond Sales Opens(Summary)

div.bibl: Denní Hlasatel, Apr. 6, 1918. CZECH SECTION FOR BOND SALES OPENS(Summary)

body.p: The state office of the Czech section of the Third Liberty Loan opens in the offices of Čermák and Serhant, realtors, 3347 West 26th Street, at 9 A. M. today.....

.....There will be several persons in every one of the forty-seven precincts of the Twelfth Ward who will represent the Czech committee, of which Anton J. Čermák is chairman. Applications may be filed there. [Translator's note: Locations are given.]
